name: Reda
description: The way to own your library.

name: QuikSnip
description: Need to send a quick code snippet to a friend? QuikSnip allows you to create and share EDITABLE code snippets with ease. Unfortunately, I don't have the time to work on this project anymore as often as I'd like.

name: Stripr
description: Remove those nasty comments you left in your code with a single command... because why not?

name: Hitlist
description: A CLI tool that allows you to execute multiple commands with a single command, plus a web dashboard for easy command management on the go on any device.

name: PHP Router
description: A composer package that brings Express-like routing to PHP with support for middleware, class-based callbacks, dynamic routes etc and still remains subjective; you write it your way (and yes, it is a terrible name sadly).

name: ResuMake
description: An open-source resume builder with a simple yet functional UI to help you create a resume that stands out using any of the available templates... or you can code your own template :)

name: NeatHTTP
description: An axios-like cURL wrapper for PHP that allows you to make HTTP requests with ease (experimental).

name: Scrawny
description: A simple console logger for Node.js (not file-system, experimental).
